alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms lifting north through Island Park toward Henrys Lake through 530 PM MDT... At 438 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms near Island Park Reservoir, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph and small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and create difficult boating conditions on area lakes. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Sheridan Reservoir, Targhee Pass, and Harriman State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Island Park Reservoir or Henrys Lake, move to shore now. Strong winds will create rough chop. Lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain
